actions.text: Submitted in the Senate and held at the desk by unanimous consent.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution to modify the provisions of S. Res. 28, relating to television in the Senate, to continue television coverage of the Senate until such time as the Senate votes on the question of continuing such coverage.

summary.text: Requires television coverage of the Senate to continue as provided in the test period authorized under Senate Resolution 28, agreed to February 27, 1986, unless the Senate votes to end coverage.

titles.title: A resolution to modify the provisions of S. Res. 28, relating to television in the Senate, to continue television coverage of the Senate until such time as the Senate votes on the question of continuing such coverage.
